markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Shield 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gauntlet Buckler](/Shields.aspx?ID=8)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Foldaway" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=476" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 20 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
**Price** 5 gp

**AC Bonus** 1 

**Speed Penalty** —
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Bulk** 1

**Hardness** 3

**HP (BT)** 6 (3)
</row>

</column>

---

This [buckler](/Shields.aspx?ID=1)-sized shield is segmented, allowing it to collapse into a housing bound to a [gauntlet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=4) for easy storage. A small catch enables you to expand the shield quickly in battle when you're in need of defense.
name: Gauntlet Buckler

text: <title level="1" right="Shield 0" pfs="Standard" > Gauntlet Buckler Source Treasure Vault pg. 20 1.1 Price 5 gp AC Bonus 1 Speed Penalty — Bulk 1 Hardness 3 HP (BT) 6 (3) --- This buckler-sized shield is segmented, allowing it to collapse into a housing bound to a gauntlet for easy storage.
